articles.description: Issues with what Facebook calls a configuration change caused iPhone users to get logged out of the Social Networking Giant's app on Friday. Those supporting 2FA had problems logging back in.

articles.title: List of second batch of devices getting OriginOS public beta released - gizmochina
articles.description: Earlier this month, Vivo released an open beta version of OriginOS for 11 devices. It has now released the list of the second batch of devices that are eligible for the public beta. The recruitment for the public beta will begin on January 25 according to the…
articles.content:
Earlier this month, Vivo released an open beta version of OriginOS for 11 devices. It has now released the list of the second batch of devices that are eligible for the public beta.

articles.title: Oppo Reno5 Pro 5G receives January 2021 security patch and camera improvements - Gizchina.com
articles.description: Not long after Oppo Reno5 Pro 5G release in India, the company is pushing a new firmware update with camera improvements and January 2021 security patch.
articles.content: Not long ago, Oppo unveiled its Oppo Reno5 Pro 5G as its first mid-range contender to conquer the market in 2021. The company unveiled in China and a couple of weeks later started its global campaign… [+2161 chars]

articles.title: Vivo S7t coming soon with Dimensity 820 SoC - Gizchina.com
articles.description: Vivo is gearing up to launch a new Vivo S7t smartphone. According to a leak from Digital Chat Station, it will pack a Dimensity 820 SoC.
articles.content: Vivo has revealed the Vivo S7 5G in August last year and a few time later unleashed the S7e 5G variant. Now, a new report indicates that the brand is gearing up to launch a third member for the S7 li… [+1913 chars]
